# AVAudioSessionSetActiveFlags_NotifyOthersOnDeactivation

**Global Variable**

A flag that indicates that when your audio session deactivates, any audio sessions that your audio session interrupted can reactivate themselves.

## Declaration

```swift
var AVAudioSessionSetActiveFlags_NotifyOthersOnDeactivation: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This flag works when passed in the `flags` parameter of the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/setActive(_:withFlags:)] instance method. You use this flag only when deactivating your audio session.

## Getting Standard  Options

- **notifyOthersOnDeactivation**: An option that indicates that the system should notify other apps that you’ve deactivated your app’s audio session.
